meaningMnemonic: A magic <radical>thread</radical> fell from the <radical>roof</radical> onto the <radical>leader</radical> of a <radical>hundred</radical> people, causing him to <kanji>shrink</kanji>!
readingMnemonic: As the leader <kanji>shrink</kanji>s, the hundred people start screaming and running around the entire place. As a result, everything is <reading>shook</reading> (しゅく) up. Especially the poor, shrunken leader, who gets knocked around the most.
